source_text: The Company to receive a 1% NSR in respect of the sale of all precious minerals and a 1.5% NSR in respect of the sale of all non-precious minerals extracted from the Tenements.
additional_details: Royalty received by Peregrine Gold Limited ("The Company"). Royalty paid by Capricorn Metals Limited (ASX: CMM) as the acquirer of the project. This 1% NSR applies to precious minerals.
